author: Shereena Qazi
title: Anguish as Sri Lanka forces Muslims to cremate COVID-19 victims
description: Rights group and activists accuse gov't of forcing cremation of Muslim COVID-19 victims in disregard to WHO guidelines.
content:
The forced cremation of two COVID-19 infected Muslims in Sri Lanka has sent shock waves among the minority community, which accused the authorities of violating Islamic burial rites.
